description:
Daraz's first ever Free Delivery Festival is here!
Shop from over millions of products at the best prices possible, and get your items delivered for FREE.

Here’s what Daraz Free Delivery Festival has in store for you: 

FREE DELIVERY NATIONWIDE 
Shop over millions of products from the convenience of your home, and get your items delivered for free.

EXCLUSIVE PROMOTIONS ON YOUR FIRST ORDER
Enjoy an exclusive new user discount from us on your first order. Download the Daraz app now!

BEST PRICES POSSIBLE
Buy your everyday needs on Daraz at lowest prices:
• Any 3 Deals: Buy any 3 items from as low as USD $6
• Everyday Low Price: Best budget finds under USD $1

SAVE MORE WITH DARAZ COINS
Earn and use Daraz Coins to get extra discounts! 
• Check in daily to collect Daraz Coins
• Earn upsized Daraz Coins rewards when you play Daraz Candy

WATCH YOUR FAVOURITE STARS ON LIVESTREAM
A fun and interactive way to shop with live streaming on Daraz. 
Tune in to Daraz Live to watch your favourite influencers showcase the products before buying. Plus, additional discounts for Daraz Live viewers.

BUY EVERYTHING ON DARAZ AT BEST PRICES 
• Browse and shop from our range of categories, including health & beauty, electronics, fashion, home & living, and more
• Get 100% authentic products from official brands on Daraz Mall
• Transact with your preferred payment method - COD (Cash on Delivery), bank transfer, or credit card 

SHOP WITHOUT WORRIES WITH DARAZ GUARANTEE 
• Free and easy returns: If an item doesn’t meet your expectations, return the item in just 5 simple steps within 14 days 
• Safe and secure payments: We are PCD-DSS compliant, which means all transaction data is encrypted, and the system is monitored for suspicious activity to ensure your safety 
• 24/7 Live Support: Need help? We are always here for you - connect with us for any questions 

If you face any technical issues, please drop us a line at support.app@daraz.com

The app needs the following access permissions when it is running on your device:

-	Optional permission(s):

o	Notification: it will allow us to send push notifications to your device.

o	Camera: the camera function is required when you need to capture photos and videos and upload them to the app.

o	Photo and video: it will enable you to upload photos and videos from your device to the app.

o	Location: where the relevant service is available, it enables location based services on your device. 
(This is not used in Korea.)

o	Calendar: it enables you to sync the SHEIN LIVE events to your device calendar. 

o	Microphone: when you try to capture videos using Camera function, the app will also need the microphone access permission to capture the voice. 

※ Even if you do not grant optional access permissions, you can still use SHEIN service, except for the functions related to those permissions.

OLX is the perfect online marketplace to buy and sell. No need to visit the flea market to find the best deals on pre-owned items! Here you’ll find a wide selection of new and used products, including vintage clothes, antique furniture, used books, retro games, electronics, pre-owned cars and studios for rent. Also, an extensive listing of services and jobs. It’s safe and easy.
 
OLX is the biggest and fastest growing super app to buy and sell locally. Over 30 million downloads and 3 million listings! Here's why millions of people are buying and selling on OLX:
 
GREAT SHOPPING EXPERIENCE
The free online marketplace app from OLX assures you of a great shopping experience with a lighter app where you can Buy and Sell, faster load time & wide selection across categories. You can search for your desired products by product name, category or brands. With OLX Pakistan, you are guaranteed 24x7 customer service!
 
FAST AND CUTTING-EDGE
•List something in seconds
•Make money selling your new and used items
 
FUN, SIMPLE AND INTUITIVE
•Discover stuff for sale nearby or search for something specific
 
Looking to sell your car or upgrade your mobile? Or just on the lookout for great deals? Then OLX is the app for you! You can also discover what others around you are selling in your neighborhood.
 
Here are some of the awesome things you can do with the OLX App:
- Sell your unwanted items quickly, straight from your phone
- Find verified sellers in your neighborhood and get to discover great deals
- Chat with sellers directly to negotiate your deals from the safety of your home
- Easily Manage and edit your ads while on the move
- Get personalized alerts and recommendations based on your interests
 
Get mobile phones, mobile phone accessories, electronics and home appliances, exercise and fitness equipment and fashion, health and beauty products and much more by top brands.
 
More about our top categories:
 
Mobiles
We’ve got all the mobile phones like Apple iPhone, Redmi, Samsung Galaxy, One Plus, Huawei, Nokia, Xiaomi, Oppo, Vivo, Poco, Infinix, Tecno, QMobile, Rivo and many more. With OLX Classified you can sell your mobile in minutes and upgrade too by choosing your favorite brand from our wide selection and more, accessories - memory cards, earphones, smart watches, chargers, power banks.
 
Cars and Bikes
OLX Motors listings of new and used cars and bikes for sale will make your heart go ‘vroom vroom’! Whether you’re looking for sedans like Honda Civic or Toyota Corolla, or popular hatchbacks like Suzuki Swift or Toyota Vitz or hybrids like Prius, tough SUVs like Prado, Land Cruisers and Jeeps or compact SUVs like Kia Sportage, Hyundai Tucson, MG HS ; we’ve got you covered. We also have a selection of heavy bikes and not so heavy bikes like Honda 125, in addition to Vespa scooters and bicycles.
 
Electronics
From selling used electronics to buying new gadgets, it all happens on OLX. You will find top brands in TVs, laptops, computers, games, refrigerators, air and water purifiers, washing machines, household appliances and more.
 
Real Estate
Look for a residential or commercial plot, house for sale and rent, apartment, hotel room or guest house in your favorite neighborhood with our quick search. With a wide-ranging selection of listings from dealers and individual landlords, you are sure to find your perfect home on OLX.
 
Fashion
Formal attire, vacation wear to casual and daily wear – shirts for men, sarees & gowns for women, watches, jewelry, shoes & footwear. Also kid’s clothes, footwear, toys, bags, bottles & more.
 
Furniture & Home Decor
Get sofa sets, beds, mattresses, bean bags and a lot more. 
 
We have worked hard to give you the best buying and selling app. If you have any suggestions or feedback, we would love to hear from you!

Twitter: @olx_pakistan
Instagram:@olx.pakistan

developer: Hangzhou Alibaba International Information Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
What is Alibaba.com?
Alibaba.com is one of the world’s leading B2B ecommerce marketplaces. Our app allows you to source products from global suppliers, all from the convenience of your mobile device.

Purchase with confidence
Our Trade Assurance service protects your orders and payments on the platform, letting you purchase securely and conveniently with extended support.

Customizable products
Meet suppliers with years of customization and order fulfillment experience for sellers on Amazon, eBay, Wish, Etsy, Mercari, Lazada, and more.

Easy sourcing
Discover millions of ready-to-ship products in every industry category. Tell suppliers what you need and get quotes quickly with Request for Quotation services.

Fast shipping
Alibaba.com partners with major freight forwarders to provide land, sea, and air shipping solutions with on-time delivery services, end-to-end tracking, and competitive prices.

Livestreams and factory tours
Interact with manufacturers in real-time via product demos and tours of manufacturing facilities, providing insight and oversight on how your products are made.

Popular categories and trade shows
Source a wide range of popular items – from trending consumer goods to raw materials – and join our annual trade shows for niche product highlights and discounts.

Quality control
Choose Alibaba.com Production Monitoring and Inspection Services to reduce production delay and quality risks.

Discounts and promotions
Unlock new discounts and promotions from featured manufacturers and suppliers.

Stay updated
Use the Alibaba.com app to stay up to date on new products and promotions from your favorite suppliers.

Language and currency support
Alibaba.com supports 16 languages and 140 local currencies. Use our real-time translator to communicate with sellers in your mother tongue.

Comprehensive

Quickly search, get product details, read reviews and purchase millions of products available from Amazon and other merchants.

Convenient
Sign in with your existing Amazon account to access your basket, payment and shipping options. No need to create a new account to manage your 1-Click settings and wish lists, track your orders and use your Prime membership benefits. Shop just as you do on the web.

Fast
Compare prices and check availability instantly by scanning a barcode, snapping a picture or typing your search. 

Secure
All purchases are routed through Amazon's secure servers.

Universal
Shop Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.de, Amazon.es, Amazon.fr, Amazon.com, Amazon.it, Amazon.cn or Amazon.co.jp, Amazon.sg from a single app.

For customers located within the European Union, United Kingdom or Brazil: By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use applicable for your country. Please also see the applicable Privacy Notice, Cookies Notice and Interest-Based Ads Notice for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.
 
For all other customers: By using this app, you agree to the applicable Amazon Conditions of Use (e.g. www.amazon.com/conditionsofuse) and Privacy Notice (e.g. www.amazon.com/privacy) for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.

We make shopping safe and simple. AliExpress protects your purchase with secure payments, buyer protection and easy returns. Track orders in real time, get delivery updates, and choose fast shipping options when you need items quickly. Chat with sellers or our support team right from the app.

Don’t miss limited-time Black Friday deals, exclusive app offers and flash events — AliExpress updates promotions constantly so you can save more. Whether you’re hunting for gifts, seasonal styles, or must-have gadgets, AliExpress puts endless choice and value in your pocket.

Download the AliExpress app today, join millions of shoppers, and enjoy worry-free shopping during Black Friday and all year round. Great finds and huge savings are just a tap away on AliExpress.

description:
Welcome to noon - the best shopping app in UAE, Saudi Arabia and Egypt. From mobiles to home appliances, beauty, fashion, electronics, everyday grocery essentials, fast food delivery, and more, noon is the best online shopping app for all your shopping needs.

MOBILES, BEAUTY, HOME, FURNITURE, FASHION, BABY PRODUCTS, GIFTS & MORE

Browse our online shopping app to find a huge range of fashion essentials in our online clothing store, along with footwear, accessories like bags and luggage, and more. Enjoy the best mobile phones online shopping with phones to suit your budget. Look your best with a range of beauty must-haves. Browse our baby shopping store online to find a range of toys & products for your little one. Update your space with our online furniture store app. Find the perfect Ramadan gifts for loved ones. 

SHOP TOP BRANDS

Shop laptops, computers and accessories from Apple Macbook Pro and Air, HP, Lenovo, Dell, and Asus; mobile phones and accessories from Apple, Samsung, Xiaomi, Realme, and OnePlus; audio video products from Samsung, LG, Hisense, and TCL;  headsets and headphones from Apple, JBL, Sony, and Soundcore; video game consoles and accessories from Sony, Nintendo, Asus, Logitech, and Microsoft; wearables from Apple, Samsung and Huawei; home appliances and homeware from NKX, Fashion Home, Home Box, Arabest, Syngenta, Geepas, Black + Decker, Samsung, and Nikai; apparel from Adidas, Nike and Meishida; eyewear and watches for men and women from Casio, Fossil, Tommy Hilfiger, RayBan, and Lacoste; and beauty and haircare from Maybelline New York, L'Oreal, La Roche Posay, Garnier, and Cerave.

AUTHENTIC BRANDS, INSTANT RETURNS & 2X REFUNDS WITH NOON SUPERMALL

Shop a huge range of branded products with supermall. supermall offers products from premium authentic brands, scheduled fast returns and 2x refund. Get delivery in just 60 minutes and enjoy the best customer experience with supermall.

ORDER FOOD ONLINE WITH NOON FOOD

No time to go to the restaurant? Looking for fast food delivery? Order food online and get instant delivery with the noon food ordering app. Our online food delivery app is fast and easy to use. Enjoy your favourite dishes with instant delivery from 10,000+ restaurants, 100+ cuisines with exciting discounts.
  
GET FAST DELIVERY WITH NOON MINUTES & NOON NOWNOW

Stock your pantry and order fresh groceries online. Our fast grocery delivery app NowNow offers products from supermarkets and pharmacies like Spinneys, VIVA Supermarket, Choithrams, Aster Pharmacy and others. Enjoy instant delivery to make grocery online shopping fast and simple. Choose Express delivery for fast delivery at noon or shop with noon supermall for instant delivery, 2x refunds, easy returns and products from authentic brands.

UNLIMITED FREE DELIVERY & EXCLUSIVE DEALS WITH NOON ONE

Get unlimited free delivery on noon, instant delivery on noon Food and noon NowNow, exclusive deals, and more at just 25 AED per month. Get fast, free next-day delivery through express and fast delivery services with no minimum orders and fast and free same-day delivery on all orders over 100 AED. 

EXCLUSIVE DEALS & COUPONS

Enjoy online deals, offers, vouchers, promo codes and other ways to save when shopping at the noon online shopping store. Save with 11.11 sales, Yellow Friday deals, Ramadan specials, daily deals on fresh groceries and more.

WORLD-CLASS SHOPPING EXPERIENCE

Get instant access to our deals and discount shopping store. Enjoy free and fast delivery, exclusive deals, discounts, coupon codes and more. Save products to your wishlist and enjoy other in-app features. Shop authentic branded products with noon supermall.

MULTIPLE PAYMENT OPTIONS 

Pay with cash on delivery, credit or debit cards, or choose split payments over 4–12 months with Tabby and Tamara’s Buy Now, Pay Later plans. Enjoy peace of mind with our No-Cost EMI and 15-day return policy.

Download the best online shopping app now.

The all new Daraz Seller Center App for iOS is now even more convenient than before! You can easily monitor your business almost anytime and anywhere. The App has a number of great features and you can now respond to growing customer demands at Daraz quicker and with more ease. This new app allows you to sell online with comfort and ease. 

Features:
1. Keep a trackThe new Daraz Seller Center App for iOS makes it easier for you to view your Pending Orders. You quickly RTS them, and also keep a track of all your orders without missing any of them. 

2. Easy UpdateWith the new Daraz Seller Center App for IOS, you can update the stock count and even the pricing for your SKUs on Daraz. 
3. Direct PublishingYou can now easily edit your products or product description and even publish products directly from the new Daraz Seller App for IOS. 

4. Be a part of CampaignsWith just a single tap, you can take part in upcoming campaigns and sales exclusively at Daraz. 

5. Be ResponsiveThe all new Daraz Seller Center App allows you stay responsive. This way you can make the customers satisfied and reply to their messages and queries on the go. 

6. View your performanceYou can easily view your Seller Dashboard with the all new Daraz Seller Center App for IOS. This will help you keep a track of your performance. 

So, worry no more! Simply download the new Daraz Seller Center App now on your IOS devices and stay connected to your Daraz Shop. Happy selling on Daraz!

New Bridal & Wedding Section

Explore our latest Bridal & Wedding collection, featuring exquisite bridal dresses, formal wear, and wedding ensembles designed to make your special occasions memorable. This section highlights premium designs from Aneela’s own collection as well as top Pakistani brands.

Why Choose Aneela’s App

New upgrade: Taobao English is now available in Malaysia, Singapore, Australia, Thailand, Canada, Cambodia, New Zealand, Hong Kong, Taiwan, Macau, Kazakhstan, Uzbekistan, Kyrgyzstan, Georgia and Mongolia!For other regions, stay tuned! We're working hard to upgrade for you, in the meantime, you can still shop in our Chinese interface!

Taobao (iPhone version) offers a convenient and engaging shopping experience, specifically designed for iPhone users.

As a leading e-commerce platform in China, Taobao provides an extensive selection of products, catering to the diverse and personalized needs of over 1 billion users. Known as the "Omnipotent Taobao", it stands as a trusted destination for quality and variety for its users. 

Every day, consumers from around the globe visit Taobao, eager to explore more products for their daily needs and keep up with the latest trends!Product Features:

1. Extensive Range of Global Brands
Discover thousands of brands and retailers, offering both Chinese and international products to consumers worldwide.

2. Diverse Offerings from Small and Medium-sized Vendors
Access tens of millions of unique products from small and medium-sized businesses, as well as innovative entrepreneurs, showcasing creative and thoughtfully designed items.

3. Safe and Seamless Shopping Experience
We've integrated local e-wallets and credit card payments in selected regions, along with cross-border direct shipping options. Some products also feature free shipping and/or local return services, ensuring a secure, joyful, and effortless shopping journey.

4. NEW English Interface Now Available!
The English interface is available in Malaysia, Singapore, Australia, Thailand, and Cambodia. Simply update your language settings. We're working hard to expand this feature to more regions soon!

5. Year-Round Promotional Activities
Take advantage of our numerous promotional events throughout the year. Enjoy discounted prices and exclusive platform benefits, making it easy to find high-quality products at even better prices.

Bazaar – Pakistan's Leading Grocery Delivery App

How Delivery Works

Bulk & Repeat Orders Made Easy

Online business aur work form home cash earning k liye Markaz Istimaal Kerein. Dur Daraz k ilaqo mein asaani say sab say sasti delivery kerwayein. Apnay ghar baar mein paisay kamanay ka aik naya zarya haasil kerein. Earn online easily Hamari app k zarya. Jitna kaam utna comission utni earning.

Markaz is a reselling App from Pakistan that lets you sell high-quality products at a wholesale rate or sell to others while working from home and earning money online. Markaz makes sure that we source the best quality products at the lowest wholesale prices, allowing you to shop online at the lowest cost and resell them online, quickly earning up to 45 thousand per month. With Markaz, you can start your online reselling business with zero investment. All you need is a smartphone to get connected with Markaz, set up your reselling business, and earn money online from home.


Buy for yourself, Buy for others or sell to others and make money. Markaz will ensure:

1)	Highest Quality products 
2)	Lowest wholesale prices 
3)	Highest profits and earning - delivered in 24 hours 
4)	Quick shipping from anywhere in Pakistan 
5)	Money back return and guarantees 


How to earn money online using Markaz?


Install Markaz App: Install the App and start your own business without any investment. Register your phone number and your business name to start using the App. 


Browse quality clothing and fashion products: Search through 1,000s of clothing and fashion products shortlisted by our team for you and your customers. 


Share your favorite products: Identify the products that your customers or friends on social media networks might like. Share these products through WhatsApp, Facebook, Instagram or show them the pictures in person. You can also get orders from platforms like Daraz.


Order and Earn: If your customers like something, order it directly at their address. The products are delivered via Courier anywhere in Pakistan, and Markaz will collect money through COD (Cash on delivery). Markaz allows you to earn by setting your profit margin on each product sold. Quickly sell with 30% plus profit. 


Earn Money - 45 Thousand on the side: Sell with your selected commission on these products and achieve targets to get bonus earning.


Why should you resell using Markaz?


Trusted App for all kinds of resellers: Housewives, working women, women entrepreneurs, college students, Workingmen, businesspeople, boutique owners, beauticians, or designers. Anyone interested in starting their online business from home can join us and become a reseller with zero investment. 


Lowest prices mean highest profit: We source products directly from the best wholesalers in Pakistan. We have the highest quality items and best products that resellers can sell for higher profits—growing their business quickly at zero investment. 

We deliver the highest quality products and money-back guarantee: We have a team of quality analysts. Our quality assurance team tests all products before being listed so that you never face quality issues in any item. 


Quick payments: We deliver your profit within 24 hours of your delivery and never keep your profits for longer. AAP ka trust hamaray liyay Ammanat hai. 


Quick shipment/deliveries: We manage your shipping and deliveries, so you never have to face any hassle. We also give step-by-step updates so that you never have to worry about the current status of your product and keep your customers informed. 


Cash on delivery: we offer the best and timely cash on delivery experience. We send product on your behalf for free till customer pays for it and transfer your profit directly to easypaisa or jazzcash


Money-back guarantees and return policy: If your customer doesn’t like the product, there is a quality issue, or the delivery is damaged, let us know. 7 Day free returns

description:
Welcome to your ultimate shopping destination where everything you need, from fashion and beauty to home essentials and more, comes together in one place. Enjoy amazing deals, top brands, the latest trends, and so much more!

WELCOME DISCOUNT

First impressions matter, right? That’s why we’ve got an exclusive discount code waiting for you on your first order. Just download Trendyol and claim your welcome treat."

MORE ABOUT THE APP

Trendyol is your go-to shopping platform, making shopping easy and seamless. As you swipe through thousands of global, local and Turkish brands and millions of products, you’ll find a new trend waiting at every scroll. Planning outfits? Tracking orders? Enjoying free returns? It’s all a breeze. Here’s a tip: mark your faves and we’ll let you know when the prices drop. Download the Trendyol app today and start exploring!"

MORE ABOUT TRENDYOL

With our wide selection of clothing, footwear, accessories, home essentials, beauty must-haves, electronics, and more, Trendyol transforms shopping into an experience that’s accessible and budget-friendly. Trendyol Collection translates the latest runway trends into wearable outfits for every style, occasion and budget. Our lines range from a glamorous party selection (Trendyol Party) and a casual jeans collection (Trendyol Denim) to modest fashion looks (Trendyol Modest) and a plus-size collection (Trendyol Curve)."

Now it’s your turn to embrace your unique style from casual and relaxed to elegant and stylish with on-trend fashion pieces for women, men, and kids from Trendyol Collection. Beyond our exclusive brand Trendyol Collection, we also feature some of your most-loved brands such as: Nike, New Balance, Birkenstock, Crocs, Ray-Ban, Skechers, Adidas, Apple, Korkmaz, Samsung, Philips, Almufarrej, Karaca, Home Box, Dyson, Stanley, Lego, Madame Coco, Xiaomi, NA-KD, Converse, Jack & Jones, Dr. Martens, Calvin Klein and more.

Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using the Trendyol app. By accessing or using the app, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions.

Chase Value Loyalty app offers customers the opportunity to earn loyalty points and stay up to date on our weekly offers and latest deals. As Bronze, Silver, and Gold members, customers can view their loyalty points and redeem them accordingly. Additionally, our customers can provide shopping feedback to help us enhance their shopping experience. Our app also tracks all sales transactions to ensure that rewards points are accurately earned and applied.

The MAF Carrefour app is your first choice when it comes to shopping for groceries, electronics, household items, appliances, personal care, beauty, and more. Choose from a very large variety of fresh foods from all around the world that are ready to be delivered to your doorstep.

Instant Shopping
Enjoy instant shopping with just a couple of taps on your smartphone with the MAF Carrefour app. You find it, you love it, and you buy it.

Fresh Groceries & Organic Food
If you don’t have the time to go running around for the item you need, you can get it on the app. Whether you are looking for fresh food, vegetables, fruits, meat, chicken or anything else, it is available for purchase. And you can also buy them in bulk.

If you want to buy electronics, you can read all the specifications and features on the MAF Carrefour app and pick the one that suits your budget and needs.

Nutritional Information for All Foods
Shopping for food online is as easy as buying it from the store. All our food products have nutritional values displayed under them on the app, so just like you read through these before you buy groceries in the supermarket, you can do the same with online shopping on our app.

A Wide Range of Products
We offer a wide spectrum of products from A to Z, starting from fruits and vegetables picked up fresh for you, food cupboard items and organic products, beauty products from well-known brands, fashion that keeps you warm in winter and light in summer, as well as health, personal care, fitness & wellness items. We also offer the best value for baby care products like wipes, diapers, baby formula, and even kid strollers and necessities to raise your angels. Enjoy online promotions and exclusive shopping deals on electronics, along with a wide range of laptops, smartphones, and large and small appliances for your home.

Go Paperless
Order your groceries online now and pay zero cash by using your Carrefour wallet to make payments. You can easily top up Carrefour Pay using your credit or debit card.

Earn Loyalty Points
With SHARE & MyCLUB memberships you can enjoy countless offers as well as earn and redeem point on every purchase.
Benefits we deliver to you:
- Mobile shopping has never been easier with our app designed for your ease of use
- Create your shopping list with the MAF Carrefour app instead of writing it down
- Get your grocery delivered in 60 min using Carrefour NOW on eligible items
- Locate all Carrefour hypermarkets and supermarkets near you with our store locator
- Available in both English and Arabic languages
- Get exclusive offers MyCLUB or SHARE membership and earn loyalty points

Buying your groceries has never been easier! Download the MAF Carrefour app today and enjoy the best online shopping experience you will ever have.
* The features mentioned above are not available in all countries and regions.

Life’s easier in the eBay app! Buy and sell millions of items on the go. Discover exclusive online deals every single day.

Never miss a deal
With the eBay app, you can stay in the know with real-time alerts about your Daily Deals, order updates and more, all sent to your device with personalised push notifications.

Search, find and save faves
Experience game-changing shopping wherever you are:
● Shop by condition: From brand new to pre-loved fashion and Refurbished tech, find something that’s just right for you.
● Heart your faves: Stay in the loop on the latest drops and deals by adding them to your Watchlist.
● Search with pics: See something you like? Simply upload it with the push of a button and find matches instantly.

Planet-friendly shopping
Save money while discovering something truly unique when you shop for vintage and pre-loved finds. Plus, give great pieces a second life and help the planet while you’re at it. What’s not to love?

eBay Live exclusives
Your real-time shopping experience is here! Join the livestream for exclusive drops, live auctions, case breaks, and beyond. Connect with your community, fave sellers,
and creators for more of the things you love. 

Free selling
Clear out your space the easy way. Sell for free* and list your past loves with our handy AI tools. Plus, enjoy the benefits of Simple Delivery, including prepaid labels, automatic tracking and full protection for items lost or damaged in transit.
*Excludes Vehicles and business sellers.

Quickly list items with AI
Snap or upload a photo in the eBay app, then let AI instantly generate descriptions and key details for your listing, including brand, category and more. You can also add order tracking and chat with your community live.

Authenticity Guarantee
Shop with confidence. The Authenticity Guarantee tick means eligible trading cards, sneakers, watches and handbags will be inspected and verified by expert authenticators.

eBay Money Back Guarantee
Enjoy total peace of mind thanks to eBay Money Back Guarantee. With us, you’re covered. Get the item you ordered or your money back, it’s that simple.*

*For full eligibility criteria and all terms and conditions, visit:
https://pages.ebay.co.uk/ebay-money-back-guarantee/

Explore quick and easy payment options
We make it easy to pay for the things you want. Simply store your preferred payments safely and securely so you can check out in a flash!

Keep in touch
Your feedback is important to us. Contact us with any questions by joining the discussion at www.ebay.com/iOS.

Other utilities of the Zara App are:  
-	Favourites: Use your favourites list to save all the clothes and accessories you like.
-	Easy, intuitive and fast tracking of orders and returns. Track your order in each part of the process. 
-	Find your nearest Zara store. 
-	Activate notifications and receive information about new arrivals, launchings, special collections... 


Store mode 
-	Use your application in ""store mode"" when you are shopping in any of our stores and use all its features to improve your experience. 


Zara QR:
Use your QR on the Zara App for: 
-	Having associated all of your purchases online and at physical stores. At a physical store, identify yourself at the till with your Zara QR code and request an e-receipt.
-	In-store returns for both online and in-store purchases.
-	Collect all of your online orders at a physical store.

Download this app and get notified about our promotions before everyone else! Buy Genuine Branded Product at factory direct prices at elo (Export Leftovers). We offer 30 days money back guarantee with lowest prices anywhere in Pakistan. Buy with confidence.

Dream Dubai is a brand for winners and dreamers, and Dubai is the city where they are one and the same. Dreams in Dubai do not stop at imagination, they are realized. At Dream Dubai, we challenge the notion that dreams are unattainable, not just by foregrounding Dubai’s sheer lustrous reality, but also by providing the easiest and most inclusive platform that delivers those dreams to everyone.

A project by Dubai Festivals and Retail Establishment, Dream Dubai defies the belief that dreams are beyond reach by offering a user-friendly platform that fuses shopping and winning in one unique environment. Through the purchase of Modesh Shopping Cards from campaigns, customers receive complimentary tickets to participate in prize draws to win prizes and ‘money can’t buy’ experiences.

To see, win and live the Dubai dream, simply download the Dream Dubai mobile app and start shopping.

Dream Dubai is here so you can dream the unthinkable, win the priceless, and live the unforgettable.
